members.name: totalAmount

constantValues: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the quote.

members.description: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the quote.

members.name: totalAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreight

constantValues: Shows the total product amount for the quote, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the quote.

members.description: Shows the total product amount for the quote, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the quote.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreightBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the quote.

members.description: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the quote.

members.name: totalDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemAmount

constantValues: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the quote, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.description: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the quote, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.name: totalLineItemAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the quote. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the quote and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the quote

members.description: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the quote. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the quote and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the quote

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalTax

constantValues: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the quote, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the quote.

members.description: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the quote, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the quote.

members.name: totalTaxBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.name: willCall

constantValues: Select whether the products included in the quote should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick up or delivery instructions.

members.description: Select whether the products included in the quote should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick up or delivery instructions.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows the duration in minutes for which the quote was on hold.

members.description: Shows the duration in minutes for which the quote was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.
